title: Tripwire

properties.name: description
properties.value: Tripwires are traps, that can be found around the Isafdar forest in Tirannwn. They trigger four surrounding crossbows camouflaged as Twigs. Unsuccessful attempts to pass them will deal 10 damage and poison the player starting at 2. The player can click Step-over on the tripwire to attempt to pass them, but they can be walked or ran across if the player is willing to take the damage.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Tripwire
Tripwire
Released20 September 2004 (Update)
MembersYes
QuestNo
LocationIsafdar
OptionsStep-over
ExamineA tripwire.
Map
Advanced data
Object ID3921

Tripwires are traps, that can be found around the Isafdar forest in Tirannwn. They trigger four surrounding crossbows camouflaged as Twigs. Unsuccessful attempts to pass them will deal 10 damage and poison the player starting at 2. The player can click Step-over on the tripwire to attempt to pass them, but they can be walked or ran across if the player is willing to take the damage.

Twigs, camouflaged crossbows triggered by the tripwire.

Success chance[edit | edit source]

The success chance of passing this trap ranges linearly from 30/255 at level 1 Agility to 155/255 at level 99 Agility.[1]
